author: ias
msg: Enhanced addContextInfo to transfer MIME headers of a request SOAPMessage to HTTP headers.

author: ias
msg: Put a line of comment in front of processing MIME headers in writeToSocket.

author: ias
msg: Improved call to use Call.invoke(Message) instead of Call.invoke(SOAPEnvelope). This approach helps synchronize character encoding between request/response and transfer MIME headers to a transport layer such as HTTP.

author: ias
msg: Added invoke(Message) to simplify SOAPConnectionImpl's usage of invoke(SOAPEnvelope).

author: ias
msg: Enhanced writeToSocket to transfer MIME headers of a request SOAPMessage to HTTP headers.
